title: Bitcoin Slips Towards $42K as Interest Rates Soar; Chainlink's LINK Defies Crypto Slump
description: Cryptocurrencies slid lower Monday with bbitcoin nearing $42K as soaring U.S. interest rates amid strong economic data, hawkish Powell weighed on prices.

title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin Praises Farcaster, Disses Friend.Tech
description: The Ethereum co-founder appears big on Farcaster, a decentralized social media network making waves in crypto.

title: Coin Center Director of Research raises alarm over identity fraud via AI
description:
Coin Center’s Director of Research, Peter Van Valkenburgh, has issued a stark warning regarding the escalating threat posed by artificial intelligence (AI) in fabricating identities. Valkenburgh sounded the alarm after an investigative report revealed details surrounding an underground website called OnlyFake, which claims to employ “neural networks” to create convincingly realistic fake IDs for a […]

The post Coin Center Director of Research raises alarm over identity fraud via AI appeared first on CryptoSlate.
